verses.verse: And it was told<WH5046> Joab<WH3097>, Behold<WH4428>, the king weepeth<WH1058> and mourneth<WH56> for Absalom<WH53>.

And Mephibosheth<WH4648> the son<WH1121> of Saul<WH7586> came down<WH3381> to meet<WH7125> the king<WH4428>; and he had neither<WH3808> dressed<WH6213> his feet<WH7272>, nor trimmed<WH6213> his beard<WH8222>, nor washed<WH3526> his clothes<WH899>, from the day<WH3117> the king<WH4428> departed<WH3212> until the day<WH3117> he came<WH935> home in peace<WH7965>.

And Barzillai<WH1271> the Gileadite<WH1569> came down<WH3381> from Rogelim<WH7274>; and he went over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383> with the king<WH4428>, to conduct<WH7971> him over the Jordan<WH3383>.
